data.actual_result: Messages overlap the name and timestamp
data.expected_result: Messages are condensed properly and below the name and timestamp
data.short_description: Messages overlap name and timestamp when chat area is condensed
data.steps_to_repro: - Have some send a long message that has 2-3 lines - Condense the message area (can be done by shrinking the Discord window and opening the search feature) - Observe what happens to the messages
